ygData.subject: Re: Men!
ygData.msgSnippet: IR didn t reject Prowl s advances. Well, she didn t respond, but she didn t move away from Prowl s arm. ... Prowl looks at Snow Tech calmly as the bot jeers at

IR didn't reject Prowl's advances. Well, she didn't respond, but she 
didn't move away from Prowl's arm.

::Prowl::

Prowl looks at Snow Tech calmly as the bot jeers at him. Unknown to 
either of them, Prowl was thinking the same thoughts as Snow Tech, or 
very similar. He had already caused his and Iron Raptor's death by 
being jealous, and now he was doing it again. He needed to stop, he 
knew that, and he probably would have reacted better if it wasn't for 
his body. It was so new and uncontrolable. He had gotten mad on two 
occations since the merge, and that was two too many times.

Prowl was interrupted from his thoughts by the look on Snow Tech's 
and Shadow Cat's faces. Even though he didn't particularly like Snow 
Tech, he felt a bit concerned as to what was going on. He watches 
Snow Tech comfort his sister. Perhaps he had been wrong about this 
bot. Perhaps.

"We're not l-SLAG!" Prowl suddenly exclaims. It was his turn to be 
surprized and horrified. He had just gotten Kluster's transmission. 
His computers were displaying data that was being downlinked to him 
from the Cybertronian Fire.

"The Alliance is attack the Cybertronian Fire!" He says in 
surprize, "From what the scanners report and from Kluster's voice, it 
sounds like Zardus' entire army decided to pay us a visit!"

He looks at Iron Raptor before adding on to his last statement. "Two 
of the known Alliance Gestalt groups are there. THe Cybertronian Fire 
wouldn't stand up for too long against a force like that."

He looks at Snow Tech and Shadow Cat. His anger at Snow Tech was 
forgotten. They were all in this war together anyways. "Whatever is 
chasing you guys can wait." Hostility was gone from his voice now. He 
was serious, "We need to get back to base, or there might not be a 
base to get back to."

He looks at Snow Tech. Might as well get all the disagreements over 
with now, Prowl thinks to himself. "I'm sorry how I reacted to your 
joke. There's still a bunch I need to lear about this new body. But I 
can fly all three of you to the CF along with Iron Raptor. We need to 
get there as fast as possible."

Prowl might have admitted defeat in their argument by apologizing, 
but there was much more at stake here than some pride. He sucks in 
his pride and looks at Snow Tech. "And I'm sorry about the guns too. 
Will you help us defend the Cybertronian Fire?"






--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Alten Gould" <beastwarsaddress@h...> 
wrote:
> 
> * Snow Tech smiles at Iron Raptor, she had a new sence of humour, 
finally. 
> He lowered his sheild as she asked him, trusting that she would 
protect him 
> and not gey him killed. He looks at Prowl as he slides his arm 
around IR,*
> 
> <What a imature little heathen! He's worse than me! God, if he 
wants to play 
> games....>
> 
> * Snow Tech stopped just then, he watched as IR rejected his 
advances, and 
> was almost unable to contain his laughter. This guy was so insanely 
jelouse 
> that he didn't relize that he might be making her mad or anything 
else! What 
> a dope! he looks over at Shadow Cat who was standing there saying 
good bye 
> to the bot who had scared her erlier.*
> 
> " Sheesh! Some peoples kids, huh Shad?"
> 
> * SHadow Cat smiled tolerably at Snow Techs jest to Prowl. She then 
frowned 
> at him, knowing that this was no way a proper way to show they 
didn't mean 
> harm to the over-zelous bot. He was obviously in love with Iron 
Raptor, but 
> would his jelousy and over-protectivness jepordize their 
relashonship with 
> each-other? She knew Iron Raptor well, mabey too well, they had 
been best 
> buds back on the home planet, and Shadow Cat knew She had changed, 
but she 
> hadn't changed too much. If he kept this up, who knows what will 
happen? 
> Mabey she will get mad, or mabey not, who could judge, but one 
thing was 
> certian. If this lover of IR's pulled and crap like the crap he 
pulled on 
> Snow Tech, he would regret it. She might be Ir's friend, but she 
could only 
> take so much crap from some bots.*
> 
> * She intervened Snow Techs Awnser to Iron Raptors question of 
going to 
> base. She knew he would just say some thing smart-assed. She side-
stepped in 
> front of him, facing Iron Raptor.*
> 
> "I will fly the walking turd, just give us the directions....."
> 
> * She never finished her sentance. Her eyes dimmed and looked into 
the 
> distance, seeing something they other two bots couldn't see. Snow 
Tech and 
> the other little bot had also gone that way. Looking as if they had 
turned 
> into living vegtables. As the nano seconds flew by, a look of dread 
and 
> absalute terror crossed all three faces until they snapped out of 
it, all 
> looking at the two other bots, a mix of feeling flashing across 
their faces. 
> The little bot curled into a ball and began to whimper, and Shadow 
Cat and 
> Snow Tech looked as if they wanted to do the same. Finally Shadow 
Cat Spoke, 
> and hurridely, to Iron Raptor and Prowl,*
> 
> " Leave now! Go, they wont find you if you go!!!"
> 
> * She began backing away from them, as if the very air they 
breathed was 
> contaminated by an evil force, waving a free hand at them to depart*
> 
> " They are here! how.. What did we do wrong?"
> 
> * Snow Tech had come up to her and put his arms around her 
shoulders as she 
> shook. He awnsered her softly and soothingly*
> 
> " We did nothing wrong. They probally had transmitters implanted in 
us just 
> in case it did happen."
> 
> * He sighed and looked at the surrounding jungle.*
> 
> " Now where are they?"
> 
> * Far away, they trees shook as the terrible machines passed, 
leaving a wide 
> berth of destruction as they passed. Animals fled in their wake, 
sencing 
> that they intended harm. One of the mighty things stopped and 
swivled its 
> head 180 degrees, a light blipped and it spoke to the others,*
> 
> <Suspects spotted at nine thousand nano-meres from this location. 
Suspects 
> have with them two unadentified organic/robotic mix creachers. Is 
this a 
> search and destroy mission?>
> 
> * A voice spoke from the crowd of others*
> 
> < Search and destroy mission confirmed, anniahlate any creachers 
that the 
> suspects have had contact with. Leave no evidence of presance>
> 
> * They resumed their travel to the three bots code named Shadow 13, 
Snow 3 
> and Kitt 7.*
> 
>
